metadata.Title: CVE-2024-22362 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Drupal contains a vulnerability with improper handling of structuralelements. If this vulnerability is exploited, an attacker may be able tocause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
